pages.text: This item can store a recorded battle. There are two ways to obtain it: You can craft an empty log, or obtain a filled log from the $(l:naval_warfare:game_requirements/replaying_battles/battle_recorder)Battle Recorder/$. You can $(thing)Right Click in the air/$ to copy the stored log to your clipboard, which you can then share with other players. You can $(thing)Shift Right Click in the air/$ to load a log from your clipboard. It is recommended you use an empty log for this.
To replay a battle, $(thing)Right Click/$ a $(l:naval_warfare:game_requirements/replaying_battles/battle_viewer)Battle Viewer/$.
